data.name: Coffeehouse Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Other games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1967530/Plow_the_Snow/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/842180/Prison_Simulator/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1674200/Alaska_Gold_Fever/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1874980/Ready_for_Riot/

Coffeehouse is a first-person management game - you play as an owner of small coffee business, and your task is to become the best place to get a coffee in this town!
Have you ever dreamed of owning a small place where you can sell coffee, tea, and cake to your lovely customers? Coffeehouse is exactly that! Take care of customer orders, make coffee, resolve customer problems and lose yourself in micromanaging. Soon, you're gonna become the biggest coffee boss!

Features:


- Make heavy cream patterns. Each coffee is unique!



- Serve your masterpiece to the customers with various tastes and balance the profits!



- Customize your shop: buy furniture, paint the walls, and choose a theme for your shop! Retro or modern style? You decide!



- Learn different ways to make coffee!



- Clean, do dishes and when you get tired of it - hire some help!

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / AMD R9-380
